page.title: 02HOMES IN WILMSLOW
page.content: Many of the houses in Wilmslow are {detached ,semi-detached or terraced Most have{garages,}but some people park their cars outside their house. Nearly all the houses have front and {back gardens. }For a{four bedroomed, {detached house,}you would probably pay about 60,000 pounds. { { SAMANTHA'S HOME My house was built in 1867.It was owned by a farmer and a brigadier.The farmer named the house{Maxwellton after his black horse. During the last war people who lived in the houses in Welton Drive sheltered in our cellars till the bombs had stopped. After the war,the house,which was very large was divided into two. The half I live in was called{Kelstern. }
